SELECT TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, SUM(PAY_AMT) AS TOTAL_PAY_AMOUNT FROM PAY WHERE REFUND_FLAG = 0 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT TO_CHAR("PAY_DATE", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "DATE", SUM("PAY_AMT") AS "TOTAL_PAY_AMOUNT" FROM PAY WHERE REFUND_FLAG = 0 AND TO_CHAR("PAY_DATE", 'YYYY-MM') = #{currentYearAndMonth} GROUP BY TO_CHAR("PAY_DATE", 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR("PAY_DATE", 'YYYY-MM-DD')
